summary: Lorecraft-ifies \'Weapon Variants Expansion\' by \'Is This Display Name Taken\'
descriptionHtml:
Latest notes click the version number above ^^

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft 3.0+[/url] by ArcaneSmith
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=/downloads/file.php?id=10902]Weapon Variants Expansion[/url] by \"Is This Display Name Taken\"
--
Module for Lorecraft - requires [url=/downloads/file.php?id=9959]Lorecraft-3.0[/url]+ download to function.

--
[b]Features[/b]
Uses existing Lorecraft books, as these are mostly variants.
3 new books: Staves, Blades of the Akaviri, Scimitars of Hammerfell
Lorecraft dynamic looting and vendors.

--
[b]Load Order[/b]
Ensure this loads after WVExpansion.esp
author: ScarabMonkey and Is This Display Name Taken
